title: The Iconic Skin & Needles Gets Real On Plastic Surgery, Facial Aesthetics, Injectables, Instagram Pressure, Filters, Botox, & Celebrity Secrets
itunes:title: The Iconic Skin & Needles Gets Real On Plastic Surgery, Facial Aesthetics, Injectables, Instagram Pressure, Filters, Botox, & Celebrity Secrets
description:
#380: On today's episode we are joined by Anush Movesesian also known as Skins And Needles. Anush is a cosmetic nurse practitioner that specializes in aesthetic medicine. On todays show we discuss what's really happening with plastic surgeries. We also discuss facial aesthetics, injectables, Instagram pressure, filters, botox, & celebrity secrets. 

To connect with Anush Movsesian click HERE

To connect with Lauryn Evarts click HERE

To connect with Michael Bosstick click HERE

Read More on The Skinny Confidential HERE

For Detailed Show Notes visit TSCPODCAST.COM

To Call the Him & Her Hotline call: 1-833-SKINNYS (754-6697)

Check Out Lauryn's NEW BOOK, Get The Fuck Out Of The Sun HERE

This episode is brought to you by The Skinny Confidential 

The Hot Mess Ice Roller is here to help you contour, tighten, and de-puff your facial skin and It's paired alongside the Ice Queen Facial Oil which is packed with anti-oxidants that penetrates quickly to help hydrate, firm, and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, leaving skin soft and supple. To check them out visit www.shopskinnyconfidential.com now. 

This episode is brought to you by Beekeeper's Naturals

Beekeeper’s Naturals is on a mission to reinvent your medicine with clean, effective products that actually work. Bee propolis delivers natural germ-fighting properties and antioxidants to defend and protect our bodies. It’s sustainably sourced and this Spray is made with just three simple ingredients. You’ll never find refined sugars, dyes, or dirty chemicals in these products. Ever. We've worked out an exclusive deal for Skinny Confidential listeners. Receive 15% off your first order. Go to www.BEEKEEPERSNATURALS.com/SKINNY or use code SKINNY at checkout to claim this deal. 

This episode is brought to you by Joovv. Experience the benefits of red light therapy by one of the best in the business; JOOVV! To experience the Joovv and receive a free gift with purchase go to joovv.com/skinny

Produced by Dear Media
